title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 549/94 of 11 March 1994 adjusting the codes of certain products listed in Council Regulation (EEC) No 426/86 on the common organization of the market in poducts processed from fruit and vegetables
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 549/94 of 11 March 1994 adjusting the codes of certain products listed in Council Regulation (EEC) No 426/86 on the common organization of the market in poducts processed from fruit and vegetables
THE  COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.

(2), (3) and (4) shall apply from 1 January 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 March 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 34, 9. 2. 1979, p. 2.
(2) OJ No L 312, 27. 10. 1989, p. 5.
(3) OJ No L 49, 27. 2. 1986, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 31, 4. 2. 1994, p. 3.
(5) OJ No L 267, 14. 9. 1992, p. 1.
(6) OJ No L 241, 27. 9. 1993, p. 1.
